Windlord/Najah/Feline::

Windlord::

Windlord Saw Oblitercon eat someone and started to fire again his 
feathers-missiles against him (25 feathers missiles)

***********
Najah::

Najah, who still was flying , heard the missiles turned his body and 
spat his acyd towards the missile. He noticed that his mega-bazooka 
was dissapears "Anyway" said the snake while he showed his Gun and 
shot against Silverbolt "I need start my collection of Maximals 
Deaths"

**********
Feline::

Feline avoided a missile, that exploted, she fell and ahw felt 
stunned.

new sun

around and

shooting out

the

taking a
